official_title: A bill to amend the Act of October 21, 1970, establishing the Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore, Michigan, as amended.

summary.text: Increases the authorization of appropriations for land acquisition for the Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore in Michigan.
